notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.S.—Data processing, model development, and drafting of manuscript. V.G.—extraction of CORDEX data, projected scenario by 2030s and drafting of manuscript, P.S.—analysis of malaria and climatic data and drafting of manuscript, R.C.D.—Conception, study design, drafting and critical revision of manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
